items.sentence: Tom did his best to keep temper under control.
Tom did it much better the second time around.
There\'s one thing you need to know about Tom.
I have some books that you might like to read.
I heard that Tom wants to buy a new snowboard.
I saw at a glance that he was an ordinary man.
Have you run into this kind of problem before?
Have you told anyone about the surprise party?
Having done my homework, I watched television.
We know you\'re the one that broke the window.
